title: zombie bot
extract: A zombie (also known as a bot) is a computer that a remote attacker has accessed and set up to forward transmissions (including spam and viruses) to other computers on the Internet. ... Attackers typically exploit multiple computers to create a botnet, also known as a zombie army.
extract_html: A zombie (also known as a bot) is a computer that a remote attacker has accessed and set up to forward transmissions (including spam and viruses) to other computers on the Internet. ... Attackers typically exploit multiple computers to create a botnet, also known as a zombie army.
